column4: based on my calculations
column5: that the ring cannot be made of titanium alone:

column1: =226.515mm^3 which corresponds to 0.226515cm^3
Titanium has a density of 4.54g/cm^3. Therefore
column2: the ring should weigh 0.226515×4.54= approximately 1g. But it weighs 4g. So either I made a mistake in my calculations

column7: I still have to return it.

column1: Best regards"|3.0|1|Hi Katrin

Tony Stark Whiskey Glass Set (2x)

Platform 9 3/4 T-Shirt (2x)

column1: E1059526|Claudia|Naja|First of all
column2: I am a huge LOTR fan and own quite a few fan items. I have this bottle twice
column3: as I bought it for myself and then received it as a Christmas gift again
column4: since the giver didn't know I already had it. What immediately caught my attention is that both bottles are different (the bottom has a different shape and the lid is also slightly different). The design is great
column5: although the image on one bottle is more matte and on the second one it is glossy. Unfortunately
column6: the second bottle was missing the sealing ring under the suction opening
column7: so it couldn't be used at all. (No
column8: you can't lose it
column9: as the suction part is very difficult to remove). Thanks to a handy man and a well-equipped workshop
column10: we had a suitable ring at home. So far
column11: so good. The biggest flaw I see is the lack of tightness - it's practically non-existent. As soon as you tilt it
column12: it leaks (not exactly great when you suddenly realize that the hanging bag is dripping because the bottle inside is obviously not always transported upright). Another flaw is that the seal begins to mold after the shortest time. (I rinsed it with warm water after each use since you shouldn't put it in the dishwasher
column13: but that's not enough; you also need to pop out the sealing ring in the lid - which only works with a toothpick or similar tool (be careful
column14: the seal tends to tear easily). All in all
column15: if you need a nice bottle to look at
column17: but functionally it's a total no-go
column19: thank you very much for your detailed feedback. These defects should not occur and we will check the product. Please write us an email to our customer support. My colleagues will be happy to assist you with the return or exchange. Best wishes from Elbenwald!"|2020-01-06 14:32:49

column1: E1061245|MetalGreymon|Retrospektive|"Hello
column2: dear Elbenwald team

column1: I love browsing through your new releases in the hope of finding such treasures! I've been noticing for a while now that you mainly promote and glorify mainstream ""nerd topics"" or current trends (ES
column2: Batman's 80th). Of course
column3: HP
column4: LotR
column5: and Marvel are very popular
column6: but I've always admired you for not necessarily offering the usual merchandise... But nowadays
column7: anyone who has watched the movies in the above areas can call themselves a fan. It's a shame and a bit embarrassing that the true hardcore fans from the very beginning of the HP/Marvel/LotR universe are lumped together with them. It really doesn't make you feel special as a ""nerd"" anymore.

column1: Well
column2: long story short
column3: sometimes
column4: though rarely
column5: you surprise me with things like the Digimon T-shirt
column6: and a little hope begins to grow. Hard to believe it's been 20 years already :(

column1: I really hope this shirt won't be the only item you have for Digimon fans
column2: as some of your A-Z brands only have one or two items (see Sonic or The Division from the gaming industry). *sheepish look*

column1: It would also be great to see another milestone in video game history besides the mustachioed plumber: Final Fantasy!!! Painfully and yet absolutely current since VI here as well.
But these are just suggestions. I'm just happy that you've taken a very small step into the almost retro scene of the late 90s with Digimon. It surprises me quite a bit
column2: as I often heard the anime's opening song in your stores but never saw any merchandise...? :/

column1: Sorry for rambling
column2: a bit more came out than planned. Thumbs up and ten points in advance for Slytherin... uh
column3: I meant Elbenwald
column4: for the Digimon T-shirt. Preferably in men's cut
column5: as there were also a few fans to be found ;)

column1: Yours
column2: MetalGreymon"|5.0|1|Hi MetalGreymon
column3: thank you very much for your detailed feedback. I have passed your comments on to my colleagues. :-) Best regards from the Elven Forest!|2020-02-11 22:14:49

column1: with the other wand
column2: you probably mean the wand of Ginny in the character edition. The wand for young wizards includes a bookmark
column3: the character wand does not. The wand for young wizards is made of plastic and is smaller than the replica. The replica is made of a resin mixture and is also equipped with a metal rod in the middle
column4: so that it lies better in the hand and is also more stable. The replica also comes with a gold-colored nameplate. The wand for young wizards is better suited for children
column5: as it is not as fragile if it happens to fall on a hard surface.

column2: aber... |"So
column3: I really love the glasses! 10 points for that!

column1: Butterbie
column2: unfortunately
column3: is not my thing
column4: so one point deducted. Nevertheless
column5: you can use the glasses really well for iced tea or other drinks.

column1: There's just one question left unanswered:
How heat-resistant are the glasses? Can you pour boiling water into them (for example
column2: for tea or coffee)?"|5.0|1|"Hey Mey Malfoy

column1: yes
column2: that should work. It's best to start by pouring just a small sip of hot water into the glass first
column3: so it can warm up briefly and get used to the heat. Once it has had hot water in it

E1016416|Merle|100 Punkte für Elbenwald|"Just received the package and of course
column2: the sweater had to be unpacked and tried on immediately.

column1: The anticipation alone was huge
column2: but when I unpacked and put on the sweater
column3: honestly
column4: I didn't know what to say. The only thing I could muster were a few screams and words like ""omg"" or ""wow
column5: I was as excited as a little kid ^^

column1: The package arrived intact and on time
column2: so everything is great!

column1: But now about the product itself
I'm 1.82 meters tall and have a ""normal"" figure
column2: neither very fat nor very thin
column3: and I took the sweater in size L because I'm very tall and the sleeves are often too short. This is not the case here
column4: for example
column5: it fits almost perfectly and the sleeves have a pleasant length
column6: but the sweater should not be much shorter.

column1: As for the fabric
column2: which is immediately noticeable when you touch and put on the sweater. Very soft and super comfortable to wear
column3: feels very high quality and doesn't look ""cheap
column4: meaning it doesn't fit me very tightly (which I didn't want either)

column1: but is a bit looser
column2: yet it looks quite elegant. The fabric does itch a bit on my arms
column3: but that's due to my sensitive skin
column4: it's absolutely durable and really not bad.

column1: The details make it something special.

The embroidery on the left side makes the whole thing look a bit more ""real"" and you get more of the feeling that the sweater is supposed to convey. The decorative stripes also make it more ""authentic."" And although all of this is so subtle
column2: it still looks great
column3: exactly what makes it subtle but beautiful. When you see the sweater
column4: you wouldn't necessarily recognize that it has anything to do with Harry Potter (just because it has very small and few details)
column5: but as a Potterhead
column6: you know it immediately
column7: and that's one of the reasons why it's so great.

column1: I could wear it every day and would love to sleep in it
column2: I just feel super comfortable in this sweater^^

column1: However
column2: I have to say that I haven't washed it yet and can't say anything about that yet
column3: hopefully
column4: it stays more or less the way it is now and doesn't stretch too much.

column1: Expensive
column2: but since it comes from Scotland from the original manufacturer
column3: the price is really understandable and there's nothing to complain about.

column1: At first
column2: I was a bit unsure because of the high price
column3: but it is
column4: without a doubt
column5: worth every cent and as a Potterhead
column6: a clear must
column7: I recommend it to everyone
column8: you will not regret it
column9: you just need something like this in your wardrobe
column10: just for the feeling of being a real student at Hogwarts once^^(now I just need the tie and the right wand
column11: then we can start)

column1: Conclusion
DEFINITELY BUY THIS SWEATER^^
And a big thank you to the Elbenwald team
column2: I haven't ordered often but am already totally thrilled. Shipping has always been top and there has never been any problem. Quality is always super (which is why the prices are also quite high
column3: but what you get for it is 100% worth it)

column1: I'm really amazed by this shop and will definitely order here more often.^^"|5.0|1|"Hey Merle
first of all
column2: thank you for your incredibly great feedback. Due to the lamb's wool
column3: it absorbs a lot of water when washing. The best way to dry it is lying down so that it doesn't stretch due to the weight.

column1: She pressed the magic button ""Buy Now

column1: Shortly after

column1: Two days later

column1: Her heart raced as if ""Thor"" had struck it with his hammer.

column1: As she held the T-shirt in her hands

column1: She immediately put on the shirt
column2: grabbed her dog ""Loki
column3: and they went together into the sunset of the Heinzelmännchen Forest.

column1: E1050347|Nina W.|It's dangerous to go alone
column2: take your Hyrule blankie with you|"Recently on my couch – the sun had already disappeared behind the mountains at the foot of which I live
column3: and cooler hours were setting in. Quite unexpectedly
column4: it had been quite warm that day
column5: which is why I was only wearing a shirt of my beloved football club and a loose pair of shorts with a Star Wars print. As I lounged there
column6: playing The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
column7: something fresh began to brush against my bare legs as it grew darker. Since my partner had my football-themed blanket in use and the other option was an incredibly warm blanket
column8: I thought to myself
column9: ""I need to do something about this."" So I ordered this Legend of Zelda blanket
column10: and when it finally landed on my doorstep
column11: I was overjoyed. It's super cozy
column12: and I'm a bit sad that it's currently so warm that I don't need a blanket at all
column13: but I'm already looking forward to cooler days again.

column1: The coins I exchanged for this good and beautiful piece are absolutely worth it!

column1: E1065231|Julia|Design nicht durchdacht|"A nice cup in itself
column2: but the design is not well thought out. The motif is located as a paper sleeve ""in"" the cup
column3: i.e.
column4: between the actual cup and a transparent plastic sleeve
column5: which creates the nice 3D effect. However
column6: this is not watertight
column7: and immediately after the first careful (!) hand washing
column8: the water somehow got in between and ran down the entire length of the cup inside
column9: causing the beautiful paper motif to become totally unsightly and soggy
column10: and from now on it bulges unevenly against the plastic sleeve (whether it will dry properly again and not possibly mold remains to be seen).

column1: I understand that the cup is not dishwasher safe
column2: but that it cannot withstand even careful hand washing seems questionable to me - it is supposed to be used and therefore regularly cleaned...

column1: I am already a bit disappointed
column2: because the cup was not cheap
column3: and so I will only use it for my home coffee if at all... Too bad! 🥺"|2.0|1|We are very sorry that this should not have happened. Please contact our customer support at info@elbenwald.de. The colleagues there will be happy to assist you. ❤️|2023-09-13 16:27:36.908

column1: E1074893|Niko|Ein tolles Ausstellungsstück aber KEIN Schaukampfschwert|"First of all
column2: I would like to emphasize that this is NOT a combat sword. However
column3: you will receive a very detailed and high-quality lightsaber that is an exact replica of the original.

column1: The handle is made of metal and the blade is made of polycarbonate. The blade is powered by 3 AA batteries
column2: which are not included. There are 2 buttons on the handle to activate the functions.

column1: The blade colors available are red and purple
column2: which represent the colors of Revan
column3: as he belonged to both the light and dark sides. The colors are very vibrant and rich.

column1: In addition
column2: the sword offers various sound and light effects.

column1: For example
column2: when turning it on and off
column3: there is the characteristic ""hissing"" sound. When moving the sword
column4: there are also sounds that are familiar from the movies. When the green button on the handle is pressed
column5: effects can be simulated as if blaster shots are being deflected. The blade color can be easily changed by pressing both buttons. Visually
column6: the effect of ""cutting"" through a door can also be mimicked.

column1: Additionally
column2: the sword comes with a holder for a Kyber crystal. This can be attached to the handle instead of the blade. However
column3: the small light beam produced by this is barely noticeable. Therefore
column4: it looks better visually if the crystal is presented next to the sword.

column1: Furthermore
column2: a presentation stand is included. This looks very good visually and
column3: thanks to the rubber reinforcements
column4: the handle can be securely placed on it.

column1: The blade wobbles slightly in the handle. This is not particularly strong
column2: but it prevents the sword from being used for intense combat.

column1: Therefore
column2: this sword
column3: with its high-quality optics and materials
column4: is an impressive display piece that should not be missing from any lightsaber collection."|4.0|1|Wooooooow
column5: thank you so much for your detailed feedback! We are very happy to hear that you are satisfied with the lightsaber. ❤️ Best wishes from the Elvenwood 🤗|2023-12-04 11:46:16.998
